annotations.description: It was a good decision to watch today's encounter. There has been more to see on the pitch than in most of the other games. Great display from the home side, you have to say that they were the better side today. It was obvious that the hosts tried to outplay their opponents with some passing football, while the visitors focused on counter attacking play.

We can hope that the managers will be able to motivate the players and stir them to improve their performance for after the half time break. We haven't seen really exciting football in the previous 45 minutes. The home side is dominant and dictating the tempo of the game, mainly because of their work rate and accurate passing. Pass and move. The home side have played some possession football so far, while the visitors have been patient as they wait for the right moment to hit them on the break.
